item.title: 8-Directional Movement/Animation
item.description: Problem You need a 2D character that has 8-directional movement, including animation. Solution For our example, we’ll use the Isometric Mini-Crusader, which contains 8-directional animations for idle, run, attack, and several other states. The animations are organized in folders, with a separate image for each frame. We’ll use an AnimatedSprite and we’ll name each animation based on its direction. For example, idle0 pointing to the right and going clockwise to idle7.
